ygData.msgSnippet: You can gain skill even without having someone higher than you.  You just need TIME, and lots of it.  The trick is to spam, zone, spam, zone, spam, zone.  You
ygData.messageBody:
You can gain skill even without having someone higher than you. You just
need TIME, and lots of it. The trick is to spam, zone, spam, zone, spam,
zone. You will get 1-2 increases per 3-4 zones. It works and I can
confirm it since I now have a Below Average skill in Old Erudite raised
from Very Bad.

Zolthar

>4. As for skills being allowed even after not meeting the
>creature. I think that certain ones can be learned just
>because of your level. After I level up I am sure to visit
